playn.core.gl
Class IndexedTrisShader

java.lang.Object
  playn.core.gl.GLShader
      playn.core.gl.IndexedTrisShader

public class IndexedTrisShader
extends GLShader

A GLShader implementation that decomposes quads into indexed triangles.

Method Detail

vertexShader

protected String vertexShader()
Returns the vertex shader program. Note that this program must preserve the use of the existing attributes and uniforms. You can add new uniforms and attributes, but you cannot remove or change the defaults.
